api.freeVersionDesc: No registration required, select "Free Version" in Advanced Options below
api.fullVersion: Full Version (Get API Key, Using Alibaba as an example)
api.fullVersionNote: This is just an Alibaba Cloud example - you can also use OpenAI, Gemini, or other options
api.step1: Register an account on Alibaba Cloud and
api.step3: Create a new API Key and click the copy button
api.step4: Paste the API Key into the input box below
api.tip: Please ensure the API Key format is correct. Service restart is required after saving.
api.tip2: In personal use environment, API Key will be fully displayed for copying.
api.newbieRecommend: If you don't have an API Key yet, you can select "Free Version" in Advanced Options below to start using without registering any account!
api.assistApiDesc: Assist API: Handles memory management, custom voice, text chat, and Agent mode
api.aliFeature: Alibaba: Free quota available, most comprehensive features
api.glmFeature: GLM: Rate limits are extremely strict. Audio/video model has been discontinued and cannot be used as Core API
api.stepFeature: StepFun: Has free quota, very good value, but does not support Agent mode
api.openaiFeature: OpenAI: Not available in China, expensive, high intelligence level
api.siliconFeature: SiliconFlow: Has free quota, good value, limited features, only for Assist API
api.geminiFeature: Gemini: Excellent intelligence and value, but not available in China domestic version
api.freeVersionSuggestion: Free Version: Completely free, no API Key needed, suitable for beginners (custom voice and Agent mode not supported)
api.coreApiSuggestion: Core API: Handles conversation functionality, choose based on budget and needs
api.assistApiSuggestion: Assist API: Handles text chat, memory management, custom voice, and Agent mode, only Alibaba supports custom voice
api.coreApiTitle: Core API handles voice chat functionality:
api.freeVersionCore: Free Version: Completely free, high intelligence level, supports web search, but custom voice and Agent mode not supported
api.aliCore: Alibaba: Free quota available, comprehensive features
api.glmCore: GLM: Model has been temporarily discontinued, unavailable
api.stepCore: StepFun: Completely free, high intelligence level, but rate limits are too strict, not recommended
api.openaiCore: OpenAI: Highest intelligence level, but not available in China and expensive
api.geminiCore: Gemini: Excellent intelligence and value, but not available in China domestic version
api.assistApiTitle: Assist API handles memory management, text chat, Agent mode, and custom voice:
api.freeVersionAssist: Free Version: Completely free, no API Key needed, but custom voice not supported
api.aliAssist: Alibaba: Recommended choice, supports custom voice and Agent mode
api.glmAssist: GLM: Memory management free, but concurrency/RPM limits are extremely strict, not recommended
api.stepAssist: StepFun: Cheap, but concurrency/RPM limits are extremely strict, not recommended
api.siliconAssist: SiliconFlow: Good value, supports Agent mode
api.geminiAssist: Gemini: Excellent intelligence and value, but not available in China domestic version
api.assistApiNote: Note: Only Alibaba supports custom voice functionality. GLM and StepFun are not recommended.
api.assistApiKeyPlaceholder: Optional, defaults to Core API Key

coreProviderNames.free: Free Version (N.E.K.O. Exclusive Benefit, Supports Web Search)
coreProviderNames.gemini: Gemini Live (Google, the BEST in the market)

assistProviderNames.gemini: Gemini (Google, High Intelligence, not available in China)

api.freeVersionNoApiKey: Free version does not require API Key
api.freeVersionOnlyWhenCoreFree: Free Version (Only available when Core API is Free Version)
api.freeVersionConfig: Free Version Configuration: Supports audio/video chat, text chat, and memory management. Custom voice and Agent mode not supported
api.qwenRecommendation: When Alibaba is the Core API, it's recommended to also select Alibaba as Assist API for the best custom voice experience
api.glmRecommendation: GLM's audio/video chat model GLM-Realtime has been temporarily discontinued and cannot be used as Core API
api.openaiRecommendation: When OpenAI is the Core API, it's recommended to select Alibaba as Assist API to support custom voice functionality
api.stepRecommendation: When StepFun is the Core API, it's recommended to select Alibaba as Assist API to support custom voice functionality
api.geminiRecommendation: When Gemini is the Core API, it's recommended to select Alibaba as Assist API to support custom voice functionality
api.assistApiTooltipTitle: Assist API handles memory management, text chat, and custom voice:
api.freeVersionSuggestionFull: Completely free, no API Key needed, suitable for beginners (custom voice and Agent mode not supported)
api.coreApiSuggestionFull: Handles conversation functionality (choose based on budget and needs)
api.assistApiSuggestionFull: Handles memory management, text chat, and custom voice (only Alibaba supports custom voice)
api.assistApiKeyRequiredHint: You need to fill in the API in the corresponding input box before you can select its provider
api.mcpRouterTokenDescText: Authentication token for accessing MCP Router service. Required when MCP functionality is enabled. Leave empty if your MCP Router does not require authentication.
api.mcpRouterNoteBefore: For the current version, please set up
api.mcpRouterNoteAfter: on your own. This will be improved in future versions.

step1.title: 👋 Welcome to N.E.K.O
step1.desc: This is your Neko! Let me guide you through the features~

step1a.title: 🎭 Click to Experience Expressions
step1a.desc: Try clicking on your Neko! Each click triggers different expressions and actions. Click Next when you're done~

step1b.title: 🖱️ Drag & Zoom
step1b.desc: You can drag your Neko to move her, and use mouse wheel to zoom in/out. Give it a try~

step1c.title: 🔒 Lock Neko
step1c.desc: Click this lock to lock your Neko's position, preventing accidental moves. Click again to unlock~

step2.title: 💬 Chat Area
step2.desc: Chat with your Neko here. Share your thoughts and get interesting responses~

step3.title: ✍️ Input Box
step3.desc: Type your message. Enter to send, Shift+Enter for new line. Click the button to send screenshots~

step4.title: 🎮 Quick Actions
step4.desc: Left button sends messages, right button takes screenshots. Share them with your Neko~

step5.title: 🎛️ Floating Toolbar
step5.desc: Floating toolbar with useful function buttons. Let me introduce each one~

step6.title: 🎤 Voice Control
step6.desc: Enable voice control for natural voice-based interaction with your Neko~

step7.title: 🖥️ Screen Share
step7.desc: Share your screen/window/tab with your Neko~

step8.title: 🔨 Agent Tools
step8.desc: Open Agent tool panel with various helper functions~

step9.title: 💤 Ask Her to Leave
step9.desc: Let your Neko leave temporarily. Click "Ask Her Back" to restore~

step10.title: ⚙️ Settings
step10.desc: Open settings panel. Let me introduce each setting~

step13.title: 💬 Proactive Chat
step13.desc: Your Neko initiates conversation proactively. Adjust frequency here~

step14.title: 👀 Proactive Vision
step14.desc: Your Neko actively reads screen information. Adjust interval here~

step15.title: 👤 Character Manager
step15.desc: Adjust your Neko's personality, appearance, voice, etc.~

step16.title: 🔑 API Keys
step16.desc: Configure AI service API keys. Required to interact with your Neko~

step17.title: 🧠 Memory Browser
step17.desc: View and manage your Neko's memory content~

step18.title: 🛠️ Steam Workshop
step18.desc: Access Steam Workshop page and manage subscriptions~

location.title: Tray icon location
location.desc: The N.E.K.O icon appears in the system tray at the bottom-right of your screen. Click it to find N.E.K.O.
location.note: If you don't see it, expand the tray arrow to show hidden icons.

menu.title: 📋 Tray Menu
menu.desc: You'll find a N.E.K.O icon in the bottom-right tray. Right-click it to see many options. Here are two commonly used features:

reset.title: 🔄 Reset Model Position
reset.desc: If your catgirl moves off-screen or to an undesirable position, click this option to return her to the default position~

feedback.title: 📤 Upload Logs
feedback.desc: Encountered issues or have suggestions? Click here to upload logs for feedback~

complete.title: 🎉 Tutorial Complete!
complete.desc: Congratulations on completing all tutorials! You now understand N.E.K.O's main features. Enjoy interacting with your catgirl! To review the tutorial, click "Reset Tutorial" in settings~

systray.hotkeyDesc: Configure global hotkeys here to control N.E.K.O more efficiently~
systray.exitDesc: When you want to close N.E.K.O, click Exit here. Since the window is borderless, the tray menu is the primary way to exit the application~

resetHint.title: ✨ Tutorial Complete
resetHint.desc: To view this tutorial again, go to "Memory Browser" and reset it in the "Tutorial Guide" section.

step1.title: 🎨 Select Model Type
step1.desc: First, choose the model type you want to use: Live2D (2D animation) or VRM (3D model).

step2.title: 📤 Upload Model
step2.desc: Click here to upload your model file. Supports Live2D and VRM formats.

step1.title: 🎭 Select Live2D Model
step1.desc: Choose a Live2D model from the uploaded models.

step2.title: 💃 Select Motion
step2.desc: Select a motion for the Live2D model. Click "Play Motion" to preview.

step3.title: 😊 Select Expression
step3.desc: Select an expression for the Live2D model. You can set a persistent expression.

step4.title: 🧷 Persistent Expression
step4.desc: Select a persistent expression to keep the model in that expression until changed.

step5.title: 😄 Emotion Configuration
step5.desc: Configure emotion expressions for the Live2D model. Set different expressions and motions for different emotions.

step6.title: ✨ Face Customization
step6.desc: Enter the face customization system to fine-tune Live2D model parameters for your unique Neko.

step1.title: 🎭 Select VRM Model
step1.desc: Choose a VRM 3D model from the uploaded models.

step2.title: 💃 Select Animation
step2.desc: Select an animation for the VRM model. VRM supports rich 3D animations.

step3.title: ▶️ Play Animation
step3.desc: Click to preview the selected VRM animation.

step4.title: 😊 Select Expression
step4.desc: Select an expression for the VRM model. VRM supports multiple facial expressions.

step5.title: 💡 Lighting System
step5.desc: VRM supports professional 3D lighting. Adjust ambient light, main light, fill light and rim light.

step6.title: 🌟 Ambient Light
step6.desc: Adjust ambient light intensity. Higher values make the model brighter.

step7.title: ☀️ Main Light
step7.desc: Adjust main light intensity. Main light is the primary light source affecting contrast.

step8.title: 🌞 Exposure
step8.desc: Adjust overall exposure. Higher values brighten the image, lower values darken it.

step9.title: 🎞️ Tone Mapping
step9.desc: Select different tone mapping algorithms to control highlight and shadow rendering.

step1.title: 🎭 Select Model
step1.desc: First select the Live2D model to edit. You can only adjust parameters after selecting a model.

step2.title: 🎨 Parameter List
step2.desc: Shows all adjustable parameters for the model. Each parameter controls different parts like eye size, mouth shape, head angle, etc.

step3.title: 👁️ Real-time Preview
step3.desc: Left side is the preview area. See model changes in real-time as you adjust parameters.

step4.title: 🔄 Reset All Parameters
step4.desc: Click to reset all parameters to default values. Use this if you're not satisfied with adjustments.

step1.title: 🎭 Select Model
step1.desc: First select the Live2D model to configure emotions. Each model can have independent emotion settings.

step2.title: 😊 Emotion Configuration Area
step2.desc: Configure expressions and motion combinations for different emotions. Your Neko will automatically switch emotions based on conversation.

step3.title: 🔄 Reset Configuration
step3.desc: Click to reset emotion configuration to default values.

step1.title: 👤 Master Profile
step1.desc: This is your master profile. Profile name is required, other info is optional. This affects how your Neko addresses you.

step2.title: 📝 Set Profile Name
step2.desc: Enter your name or nickname. Your Neko will use this to address you. Max 20 characters.

step3.title: 👥 Gender Setting
step3.desc: Optional. Enter your gender or related information. This affects how your Neko addresses you.

step4.title: 💬 Nickname Setting
step4.desc: Optional. Set a nickname for yourself. Your Neko may use this nickname to address you.

step5.title: 🔑 API Key Settings
step5.desc: Click here to configure AI service API keys. Required for your Neko to chat.

step6.title: 🐱 Character Profile
step6.desc: Create and manage multiple Neko characters. Each has unique personality, Live2D appearance and voice. Switch between them anytime.

step7.title: ➕ Add New Character
step7.desc: Click to create a new Neko character. Set name, personality, appearance and voice. Each character is independent with own memory.

step8.title: 📋 Character Card
step8.desc: Click character name to expand/collapse details. Each character has independent settings including basic info and advanced config.

step9.title: 📝 Character Name
step9.desc: This is the character's name and unique identifier. Can be changed later via "Rename" button.

step10.title: ✨ Custom Attributes
step10.desc: Character personality settings like personality, background, hobbies, catchphrases, etc. Customize freely for unique personality.

step11.title: 🔄 Switch Character
step11.desc: Click to set this character as active. After switching, home and chat will use this character's appearance and personality.

step12.title: ⚙️ Advanced Settings
step12.desc: Click to expand advanced settings. Configure Live2D model, voice ID, and add custom personality attributes.

step13.title: 🎨 Model Settings
step13.desc: Click to select or change the character's Live2D appearance or VRM model. Different models provide different visual experiences.

step14.title: 🎤 Voice Settings
step14.desc: Select your Neko's voice. Different voice_ids correspond to different voice characteristics for unique sound.

step1.title: 🎯 Beginner Recommended
step1.desc: If you don't have an API Key, select "Free Version" to start without registration!

step2.title: 🔑 Core API Provider
step2.desc: Most important setting. Core API handles conversation.

step3.title: 📝 Core API Key
step3.desc: Paste your chosen API provider's API Key here. Can be left empty if using Free version.

step4.title: ⚙️ Advanced Options
step4.desc: Click to expand advanced options including auxiliary API and custom API configuration.

step5.title: 🔧 Auxiliary API Provider
step5.desc:
Auxiliary API handles memory management and custom voice.

• Free: Completely free, no custom voice support
• Alibaba: Recommended, supports custom voice
• Zhipu: Supports Agent mode
• OpenAI: Strong memory management

Note: Only Alibaba supports custom voice.

step6.title: 🔑 Auxiliary API Key
step6.desc: If using Alibaba as auxiliary API, enter Alibaba's API Key here. If empty, uses core API key.

step7.title: 🔧 Custom API Configuration
step7.desc: Click to expand custom API options. Configure your own API server or other compatible services.

step8.title: ✅ Enable Custom API
step8.desc: Check to enable custom API configuration. Then configure independent APIs for different modules like summarization, correction, emotion analysis, etc.

step9.title: 📝 Summary Model Configuration
step9.desc: Summary model generates conversation summaries and manages memory. Configure independent API service for summary tasks.

step1.title: ⚠️ Important Notice
step1.desc: Voice cloning requires Alibaba Cloud API. Make sure you've configured Alibaba Cloud API Key in API settings.

step2.title: 🌍 Select Reference Audio Language
step2.desc: Select the language of your uploaded audio file. Helps system accurately identify and clone voice characteristics.

step3.title: 🏷️ Custom Prefix
step3.desc: Enter a prefix up to 10 characters (numbers and English letters only). This prefix identifies the cloned voice.

step4.title: ✨ Register Voice
step4.desc: Click to start cloning your voice. System processes audio and generates unique voice ID.

step5.title: 📋 Registered Voices List
step5.desc: Shows all successfully cloned voices. Select these in character manager to voice your Neko.

step1.title: 📦 Subscriptions List
step1.desc: Shows all your Steam Workshop subscriptions. Click cards to view details or perform actions.

step2.title: 💡 Usage Tips
step2.desc: To use Steam Workshop voices, go to Live2D settings page to manually register them.

step1.title: 💡 Usage Tips
step1.desc: Recent conversation content takes a moment to load. Click character name to refresh if you don't see latest chat.

step2.title: 🐱 Character Memory Library
step2.desc: Lists all Neko character memory libraries. Click a character name to view and edit her conversation history.

step3.title: 🤖 Auto Memory Organization
step3.desc: When enabled, system automatically organizes and optimizes memory content for better conversation quality. Recommended to keep enabled.

step4.title: 📝 Chat History Editing
step4.desc: Shows all conversation records for selected character. View, edit or delete specific conversations here.

fullscreenPrompt.title: 🎓 Start Tutorial
fullscreenPrompt.desc:
For the best tutorial experience, we recommend entering fullscreen mode.
In fullscreen mode, the tutorial content will be clearer and won't be obscured by other elements.
